summary.span: 定义数据库事务的核心行为，并为数据库专用事务提供基类。

span.span: Defines the core behavior of database transactions and provides a base class for database-specific transactions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，提交数据库事务。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, commits the database transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Threading.Tasks.Task CommitAsync (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task CommitAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CommitAsync (Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = null) As Task
abstract member CommitAsync : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task override this.CommitAsync : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 用于取消异步操作的可选令牌。

span.span: An optional token to cancel the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此异步方法的默认实现将委托给其同步对应项，并返回已完成的 `Task`，这可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method delegates to its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed `Task`, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Connection As DbConnection
public: property System::Data::Common::DbConnection ^ Connection { System::Data::Common::DbConnection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 指定与该事务关联的 对象。

span.span: Specifies the object associated with the transaction.

value.span: 与事务关联的 对象。

span.span: The object associated with the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单个应用程序可以有多个数据源连接，每个连接都有零个或多个事务。A single application may have multiple data source connections, each with zero or more transactions. 此属性允许你确定与特定事务关联的连接对象。This property allows you to determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the object associated with the transaction.

value.span: 与事务关联的 对象。

span.span: The object associated with the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单个应用程序可以有多个数据源连接，每个连接都有零个或多个事务。A single application may have multiple data source connections, each with zero or more transactions. 此属性允许你确定与特定事务关联的连接对象。This property allows you to determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此异步方法的默认实现将委托给其同步对应项，并返回已完成的 `ValueTask`，这可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method delegates to its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed `ValueTask`, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations.

public: abstract property System::Data::IsolationLevel IsolationLevel { System::Data::IsolationLevel get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取此事务的隔离级别。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the isolation level for this transaction.
The isolation level for this transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Rollback() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，从挂起状态回滚事务。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, rolls back a transaction from a pending state.

summary.span: 从挂起状态异步回滚事务。

span.span: Asynchronously rolls back a transaction from a pending state.
A task representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此异步方法的默认实现将委托给其同步对应项，并返回已完成的 `Task`，这可能会阻止调用线程。The default implementation of this asynchronous method delegates to its synchronous counterpart and returns a completed `Task`, potentially blocking the calling thread. 支持[异步编程](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md)的数据访问接口应使用异步 i/o 操作来重写默认实现。Data providers that support [asynchronous programming](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/asynchronous-programming.md) should override the default implementation using asynchronous I/O operations.

summary.span: 获取与事务关联的 对象，或空引用（如果该事务不再有效）。

span.span: Gets the object associated with the transaction, or a null reference if the transaction is no longer valid.

value.span: 与事务关联的 对象。

span.span: The object associated with the transaction.
